word:
I felt today the necessity of being all, all ready, that when the time of trouble such as never was, shall come, we may be hid. Oh, my Brother and Sister, I wish all of God's people could get a sight of it as God has shown 


                                   -201- 

it [to] me. The work of the Lord is going on. Souls are coming into the truth and soon the work will be all done.
